channel.title: Javier Donado

item.description: An introduction to functional programming, exploring its core principles and benefits in JavaScript

item.description: Learn how to restore the Clover bootloader using Windows. A guide for Hackintosh users

item.description: Unlock the power of Vim with tips and tricks to enhance your text editing workflow

item.description: Discover some of the most useful npm commands for managing dependencies in JavaScript projects

item.description: Uncover powerful command-line tricks and tips for Linux, macOS, and shell scripting

item.description: First impressions about ReasonML, a functional programming language that combines the power of OCaml with JavaScript interoperability

item.description: Explore how Kubernetes extends the capabilities of Docker Compose for managing containerized applications at scale

item.title: Lifescope Project
item.description: Explore the Lifescope project, a multi-faceted application utilizing AI, NLP, and modern web technologies

item.description: Learn how to set up and manage self-hosted solutions behind a NAT, with tips for cloud and Linux users

item.description: A robotic mini player for Spotify

item.description: Where are we today in our journey towards cloud development?

item.description: A free AI-based hack to superpower foreign language skills for people with no time

item.description: Explore the balance between software quality, startup agility, and product development

item.title: What Is the Internet Doing to Our Brains?
item.description: The internet is changing how we think and remember things. How do you deal with the algorithms? Learn why I created AstroBrain
